calculator.title: Deposit calculator | Fakedeposit
calculator.description: The deposit calculator will help you calculate the amount of the deposit up to the time of repayment and the interest received on the deposit for any term deposit with banks.

deposit-guarantee.title: Deposit guarantee
deposit-guarantee.description: The Deposit Guarantee Fund is an institution that guarantees the repayment of deposits in the event of bank liquidation. The amount of compensation depends on the total deposit in one bank.

fund-law.title: Law on Deposit Guarantee Fund | Fakedeposit
fund-law.description: The Law of Ukraine on the Deposit Guarantee System of individuals is the main tool for investor protection.

application-to-fund.title: Application for Deposit Guarantee Fund | Fakedeposit
application-to-fund.description: In order for depositors to receive payments, it is necessary to send an application to the Deposit Guarantee Fund of individuals. The application is written according to an officially established model.

deposit-bank-rates.title: Depostit bank rates | Fakedeposit
deposit-bank-rates.description: The most profitable deposits in banks of Ukraine. Compare bank deposit rates and choose the best deal.

deposit-tax.title: Deposit tax | Fakedeposit
deposit-tax.description: Deposit income equals all other income and is therefore taxed. Income tax is calculated depending on the interest paid.

HOME.header: Save your deposit from getting fake income
